title: Ticket #4521: Robust Job Retention Test
description:
We saw some lost jobs on windows when a windows reboot was requested with running jobs. We wanted to make sure the basics of what we do to preserve jobs was tested better.

The test takes 30 different job clusters and validates they stick around through 30 bounces off then on of the schedd using "-fast" followed by 30 condor_restart "-fast".
check_ins: 2014-Aug-07 09:57   Check-in [40888]: This test checks for job persistance when schedd and other condor daemons are taken down with -fast. #4521 (By Bill Taylor )
